item.name: Child status
item.hint: Affects the child's development.

item.name: Animal Companion
item.hint: Sets companion, but not the flute's icon.

item.name: Obtained Ring Box from Vasu
item.hint: Only used for password/linking purposes. There's also a global flag for this.

item.name: Saved Season
item.hint: This can have an effect in Ages, particularly in jabu-jabu?

item.name: Last mounted companion Y-position
item.hint: Affects a certain glitch, and not much else.

item.name: Last mounted companion X-position
item.hint: Affects a certain glitch, and not much else.

item.name: Time Portal Y
item.hint: Position is measured in tiles, not pixels.

item.name: Time Portal X
item.hint: Position is measured in tiles, not pixels.

item.name: Maple Kill Counter
item.hint: Maple spawns when this reaches 30 (or 15 with maple's ring).

item.name: Hidden Shop: Got Ring Box Upgrade
Main Shop: Got Gasha Seed (linked only)
Harvested first gasha nut
item.hint: The first gasha nut is always a bad ("class 1") ring.

item.name: Gasha Maturity
item.hint: Higher values give better rewards. Various things, like enemy kills and obtaining essences, increase this. Harvesting nuts decreases this.

item.name: Spot 0 kill counter
item.hint: Fully grown when this reaches 40. (With gasha ring equipped, this is incremented twice per kill.)

item.name: Spot 1 kill counter
item.hint: Fully grown when this reaches 40. (With gasha ring equipped, this is incremented twice per kill.)

item.hint: Fully grown when this reaches 40. (With gasha ring equipped, this is incremented twice per kill.)

item.name: D0 Visited Floors
item.hint: Bitset of floors visited, for dungeon map purposes.

item.hint: Bitset of floors visited, for dungeon map purposes.

item.name: Link Health
item.hint: Measured in quarter hearts.

item.name: Link Max Health
item.hint: Measured in quarter hearts.

item.name: # Heart Pieces
item.hint: Measured in quarter hearts.

item.name: Total Appraised Rings
item.hint: Vasu gives you the 100th ring when this reaches 100.

item.name: 0x02: Beat Ganon
item.hint: Flag set on hero's file

item.name: 0x0a: Finished intro
item.hint: This flag enables the start/select buttons, turns music on, etc.

item.name: 0x13: Saw Twinrova cutscene after maku seed
0x16: Hide era blurb
item.hint: The "time era" blurb is hidden once, then this flag is cleared.

item.name: 0x21: Pregame intro done
item.hint: Saw the "accept our quest" mini-cutscene

item.name: 0x28: Generated ring secret
item.hint: Makes the ring secret appear in Farore's book of memories.

item.name: 0x2c: Chest from Farore waiting to be opened
item.hint: Editing this has no effect. It's a temporary flag used by farore.

item.name: 0x33: Pre-black tower cutscene done
item.hint: The cutscene where Impa explains Ralph's heritage.

item.name: 0x39: Talked to Impa after Zelda was kidnapped
0x3a: Flame of Despair lit
item.hint: Set after beating Veran in a linked game

item.name: 0x3d: Link doesn't fall from sky upon starting file
item.hint: If flag 0x21 (Pregame intro done) is set, this is ignored.

item.name: 0x3e: Saved present maku tree
item.hint: This enables maku tree hints on the present map.

item.name: 0x3f: Saved past maku tree
item.hint: This enables maku tree hints on the past map.

item.name: 0x41: Entered the past for the first time
item.hint: Disables the cutscene with the surprised npc.

item.name: 0x42: Companion lost in forest
item.hint: Set after talking to the fairy on the way back from nuun highlands.

item.name: 0x44: Met Maple in the past for the first time
item.hint: Maple says something about "coming through a weird tunnel" the first time you meet in the past.

item.name: Gave advice on how to sleep
Told Blossom what kind of child you were
Stage 8 done
item.hint: Answered question / gave money / etc.

item.name: Stage 8 response
item.hint: Link's response to "stage 8" (ie. love or courage).

item.name: Personality
item.hint: 0-2 for stages 4-6, 0-3 for stages 7-9.

item.name: Seed satchel x-position
item.hint: Position of seed satchel when Maku Tree drops it
